abstract: “Do not be scared of science.” That’s the message of a science-meets-comedy radio show on BBC’s Radio 4, according to one of its hosts.

headline.main: ‘Infinite Monkey Cage’ Brings Playful Science Series to U.S.

snippet: “Do not be scared of science.” That’s the message of a science-meets-comedy radio show on BBC’s Radio 4, according to one of its hosts.
